properties.prefix:
Instrument Deployment


  • There are specific field-sets for recommended aspects of description. The “type” sub-field is used to fine tune the meaning, the “value” sub-field is used to indicate a key-word or phrase for that aspect, and the “note” sub-field is used for a longer text which amplifies the meaning or indicates a special consideration.

  • If there is no specific field-set for your purpose, use “keyword” for typed descriptive words or phrases and “note” for typed descriptive texts.

properties.description: The required name, label or formal title of the instrument deployment being described. This is the primary way of naming this deployment in the system.
properties.title: Primary Title

properties.description: Use this if there are other names or titles associated with the instrument deployment in the context of your research.
properties.title: Alternate Titles

properties.description: The type of alternate title such as Abbreviation.
properties.title: Alternate Title Type

properties.description: This is a general description or abstract about what you know about the instrument deployment.
properties.title: Summary Description

properties.description: Keywords, subject terms, key phrases classification codes, etc., ideally drawn from a thesaurus, which classifies or describes the instrument deployment and for which there are no more specific fields in the form.
properties.title: Keywords

properties.description: The type of keyword, such as Subject, Geographic or Temporal. Leaving type blank would imply general keywords.
properties.title: Keyword Type

properties.description: The type of deployment being described such as a camera trap or sensor.
properties.title: Deployment Type

properties.description: Notes pertaining to the Deployment Type being described.
properties.title: Deployment Type Notes

properties.description: Formal strings of characters that are used to uniquely identify the instrument deployment in various systems. This can also be used to create a formal identifier for the deployment for your project.
properties.title: Identifiers

properties.description: The name of the system or standard for which the identifier was created.
properties.title: Identifier Type

properties.description: A standard identifier for the instrument deployment, e.g. Deployment ID.
properties.title: Identifier

properties.description: This is the statement of different kinds of rights that are asserted for the instrument deployment information. This can include such things as access rights, credit lines, etc.
properties.title: Rights

properties.description: The type of rights being described such as Access or Use Rights.
properties.title: Rights Type

properties.description: A description of the rights surrounding the deployment.
properties.title: Rights

properties.description: Other entities that are related to the instrument deployment, such as the name of a larger project to which the deployment being described was a part, a website resource or a publication.
properties.title: Relations

properties.description: The type of related item being described, such as a project, publication or website.
properties.title: Related Item Type

properties.description: The unique identifier for the related item.
properties.title: Related Item ID

properties.description: General notes that provide descriptions for other aspects relevant to your understanding of the instrument deployment, such as special circumstances surrounding the deployment, general notes, etc., and for which there are no more specific fields in the form.
properties.title: Notes

properties.description: The type of note such as Field Notes, General Notes, etc.
properties.title: Note Type

properties.description: This can be used to register specific dates associated with the deployment, such as the begin and end dates of a specific instrument deployment.
properties.title: Time Period

properties.description: The type of date being described such as Date Deployed, Date Analyzed, etc.
properties.title: Time Period Type

properties.description: A time period name, e.g. "the 20th Century", "Mesozoic Era".
properties.title: Textual Date

properties.description: A specific numeric date associated with the time period being described.
properties.title: Numeric Date

properties.description: The type of numeric date such as begin date or end date.
properties.title: Date Type

properties.description: Current or historical spatial location information about the instrument deployment being described, such as place that the instrument was deployed.
properties.title: Place Information

properties.description: The type of place being described such as the instrument deployment location.
properties.title: Place Type

properties.description: Name of a geographic location pertaining to the entity being described e.g. Country, Province, Region, etc.
properties.title: Geographic Areas

properties.description: This is used to identify the time period during which the place is relevant to the instrument deployment.
properties.title: Place Time Period

properties.description: The type of date related to the place.
properties.title: Place Date Type

properties.description: A time period name, e.g. "the 20th Century", "Mesozoic Era".
properties.title: Textual Date

properties.description: A specific numeric date or dates associated with the place being described.
properties.title: Numeric Date

properties.description: The type of date.
properties.title: Date Type

properties.description: A brief note pertaining to the place being described.
properties.title: Place Notes

properties.description: This is used to identify people or organizations which have a special relationship to the instrument deployment. For example, the person who deployed the instrument.
properties.title: Related People and Organizations

properties.description: The role of a person associated with the instrument deployment.
properties.title: Person Role

properties.description: The name of a person associated with the instrument deployment.
properties.title: Person Name

properties.description: The role of the organization related to the instrument deployment, such as “funder” or “owner”.
properties.title: Role

properties.description: The name of the organization.
properties.title: Organization Name

properties.description: The Taxonomic Classification of the species referenced in the deployment (if applicable).
properties.title: Taxonomic Classification

properties.description: The name of the genus.
properties.title: Genus Name

properties.description: The name of the species.
properties.title: Species Name

properties.description: The common name of the species being described.
properties.title: Common Name

properties.description: Used to describe general physical characteristics of the instrument being deployed.
properties.title: Physical Description

properties.description: The type of physical characteristic being described.
properties.title: Physical Description Type

properties.description: Used to describe the observed state of the instrument being deployed.
properties.title: Condition

properties.description: The type of condition being described.
properties.title: Condition Type

properties.description: Used to describe the context in which the instrument is deployed such as habitat.
properties.title: Context

properties.description: The type of context being described.
properties.title: Context Type

properties.description: The format or media type of the instrument being deployed.
properties.title: Format

properties.description: Describe any relevant methods pertaining to the instrument deployment.
properties.title: Methods

properties.description: The type of method being described.
properties.title: Method Type

properties.description: Brief text describing the method used.
properties.title: Method

properties.description: Describe any relevant techniques used to deploy the instrument.
properties.title: Techniques

properties.description: The type of techniques used to deploy the instrument.
properties.title: Technique Type

properties.description: Brief text describing the technique.
properties.title: Technique

properties.description: Describe any relevant treatments pertaining to the instrument deployment.
properties.title: Treatment

properties.description: The type of treatment used.
properties.title: Treatment Type

properties.description: Brief text describing the treatment.
properties.title: Treatment

properties.description: Numeric measurements pertaining to the instrument deployment.
properties.title: Measurements

properties.description: This is for cases where the measurements are just a string of text. For example, “L 12 inches; H 6 inches”.
properties.title: Measurement Text

properties.description: The type of measurement such as depth, circumference, length, width or height.
properties.title: Measurement Type

properties.description: The value of the measurement.
properties.title: Measurement Value

properties.description: Unit of measurement such as feet, inches, centimeters, etc.
properties.title: Measurement Unit

properties.description: The type of date being described such as Date Deployed, Date Modified, etc.
properties.title: Date Type

properties.description: A time period name, e.g. "the 20th Century", "Mesozoic Era".
properties.title: Textual Date

properties.description: A specific numeric date associated with the entity being described.
properties.title: Numeric Date

properties.description: The type of numeric date such as begin date or end date.
properties.title: Date Type

properties.description: Explanatory text on the accuracy of the set of measurements.
properties.title: Measurement Accuracy
